admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
Essential features of the project
            include (a) construction of the Radenic Dam; (b) a diversion
            weir with intake works and a feeder canal from the Decanska
            Bistrica River; (c) water supply works for three towns of
            (Djkovica, Orahovac and Zrze) and twelve villages, including
            a water treatment plant with pumping equipment and new water
            storage facilities; (d) an irrigation distribution system;
            (e) miscellaneous works including drainage, erosion control,
            soil improvement, power supply lines, equipment, farm roads,
            buildings, demonstration farms and consultant services.
